item.description:
It's still early in the Month, so I'll put the call out for topics and presentations. If you all have anthing youd like to share, demo, flaunt or pimp...feel free to let us know you'd like some floor time.

Barring that we'll have the usual gang of faces and soe new ones talking about our favorite topic: Ruby!

Our guest network access requires support for WPA Personal so be sure to understand and or have that option when you visit, and bring your video dongles if you want to connect to the projector!

The agenda is:

1) Intro's for new folks
2) General topic discussion
3) General hacking.
4) Food & Drink (optional...but I'm definitely up for a beer or some grub after the meeting...we could break early and go if everyone seems interested.)
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the loud guy with the beard. :P
item.why: We're a nice group of geeky folks who (so far) enjoy helping one another, solving problems and sharing our discoveries.
item.name: The Metrowest Ruby Users Group May Meeting
